job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Puget Sound Energy is looking to grow our community with top talented individuals like you With our rapidly growing award winning energy efficiency programs our pathway to an exciting and innovative future is nowbrbrPSEs Planning team is looking for qualified candidates to fill an open strong Data Scientist strong positionbrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongPSE is looking for a Data Scientist to join Asset Management under the Planning organization This individual will collaborate with the business partners to answer their business questions by using advanced data analysis techniques They will work closely with the Information Architect Data Architect Data Engineer and Business SMEs to design and develop solutions to improve business values and enduser experience Through their work they will lay foundation of best practices and framework that others can followbrbrThe ideal candidate will have experience with introducing and implementing data management standards designing and developing machinelearningmodels creating predictive and prescriptive analytics algorithms data preparation processes data quality assessment and remediation strategies data cataloging tagging and decisiontree management They should also be capable of mentoring Associate or Citizen Data Scientists as they work through various data modeling and analytical projectsbrbrstronguPSE Data Scientists TypicallybrustrongulliIndependently gather requirements directly from business communities liliCreate AIML models that balance human judgment with machine intelligenceliliCommunicate these requirements to technical teams and data science colleaguesliliSupport our analytical community of practice and collaboration and mentoring modelliliParticipate in largescale data science initiatives and support and maintain finished data science products liliDesign and create data models and queries to organize and offer insights to users to help them understand model outcomesliliTrain machine learning models to guide other community of practice colleaguesliliAssess dataset data quality perform cleansing and preparation of large structured semistructured and unstructured datasetsliliWrite standards and best practice methodologies to enable data science outcome qualitybrliulInitially their task will be to help support PSEs Vegetation Management and Wildfire strategies They will provide tools and predictive solutions to help drive decision around developing a vegetation management and Wildfire strategies that will meet internal external and regulatory requirements Following this they will provide support for other asset management jobs and help influence capital spending decisions This role will also support Department of Plannings reliability resiliency and asset management programsbrbrThis person will be expected to uphold the safety compliance standards inherent in PSEs operating andor field procedures related to work responsibilities They will promotes and support a culture of total safetybrbrThis position may be subject to random DOT drug andor alcohol testingbrbrstrongstrongJob
